name: Slime Dungeon (itch) (Red_assasins)
description:
This is a game i made for a project in class, i had 1 month to do it and its my first game ever, i did every piece of the art, taking a lot of references (im new in the pixel art world).

I had huge inspiration on the binding of isaac, and i tried to do my best, the game does not have a random dungeon generation but im considering doing it, to give it more replayability.
